mapper.select: SELECT r.*, i.item_name, i.item_code, i.unit, i.reference_low, i.reference_high, u1.real_name as doctor_name, u2.real_name as reviewer_name FROM exam_result r LEFT JOIN exam_item i ON r.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON r.doctor_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON r.reviewer_id = u2.id WHERE r.record_id = #{recordId} ORDER BY i.sort
